QuestData.Title: Go Blow that Horn
QuestData.Description: That old, bitter centaur, Skycaller Vrakthris, mentioned a great air spirit that the centaur worship. To secure the Heights, the last step is for us to deal with this thing.$B$BI've seen them blow the giant horn at the top of the hill up there and an air elemental came down. It gave them orders and then dissipated.$B$BGo blow that horn, $n.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Blow the horn and then slay him!
QuestData.CompletionText: It's simple really... you blow the horn, their elemental leader shows up, and you kill it.
QuestData.RewardText: Well then, let's see them get any kind of magical hocus pocus air support now when we take over!
